dogs.review: I love staying with Laura and Lila. Laura always takes good care of me and lets me sleep on her bed and I always have lots of fun playing with Lila. Going to Laura's house to stay is my favourite!

Staying with Laura and Lila is the best! Laura always takes me out for walkies and I have fun playing with Lila and running with her in the fields near her house, it's like being at home with my family but better.

Whether I stay overnight or just during the day, Laura's house is always special and lots of fun. Sometimes Lila and I get up to mischief but Laura always tells me how much she misses me when I'm not around.
